function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"UGS serving as centers of public gathering can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implement restrictions on the number of people gathering in UGS, enforce social distancing measures, and promote public health guidelines.","Technologies":"Use contact tracing technology, crowd monitoring systems, and public health apps to track and manage gatherings in UGS.","People":"General public, visitors to UGS, local residents near UGS.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, park management."},{"Description":"Increased importance of green spaces and UGS as places of refuge during the pandemic may lead to overcrowding and congestion in these areas, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of crowding, difficulty maintaining social distancing, and heightened risk of virus spread.","Mitigation":"Designate specific visiting hours, limit capacity, and create alternative green spaces to distribute visitor traffic.","Technologies":"Reservation systems, crowd monitoring technology, and urban planning tools for creating additional green spaces.","People":"Visitors to UGS, local residents, urban planners, park management.","Owner":"Local government, urban planning authorities, park management."},{"Description":"Dependence on UGS for respite and isolation can lead to non-compliance with public health guidelines and riskier behavior in these areas.","Impact":"Reduced adherence to safety measures, potential for large gatherings, and increased likelihood of virus transmission.","Mitigation":"Increase public awareness, provide education on safe park usage, and promote responsible behavior in UGS.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, social media campaigns, and community engagement platforms for sharing safety guidelines.","People":"Park visitors, local residents, public health authorities.","Owner":"Park management, local government, public health authorities."}]}
